headline: FedEx, GXO and Pitney Bowes Cut Staff in Round of Logistics Layoffs
summary: A Memphis news affiliate reports roughly 300 employees were impacted by the FedEx layoffs, while Pitney Bowes laid off 2,300 in Q3.

headline: FedEx Corp. Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn., November 15, 2024--The Board of Directors of FedEx Corp. (NYSE: FDX) today declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.38 per share on FedEx Corp. common stock, in line with the company’s continued focus on delivering stockholder value. The dividend is payable January 3, 2025 to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 9, 2024.

headline: Q3 Earnings Roundup: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (NASDAQ:CHRW) And The Rest Of The Air Freight and Logistics Segment
summary: Looking back on air freight and logistics stocks’ Q3 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including C.H. Robinson Worldwide (NASDAQ:CHRW) and its peers.
